declarations.comments: The file mode when connection to the database
declarations.title: DbMode

declarations.comments: Sets the debug mode for sqlite to verbose
declarations.title: setVerbose

declarations.comments: Uses sqlite's built-in cache to avoid opening the same database multiple times
declarations.title: connectCached

declarations.comments:
"lastID" result value should be used only for INSERT queries,
"changes" result value should be used only for UPDATE and DELETE queries.
declarations.title: RunResult

declarations.comments: Listener for the database open event
declarations.title: listen

declarations.comments:
A boxed function that can be used as a listener. This is necessary
due to the underling implementation of Eff functions.
declarations.title: DbListener

declarations.comments:
Creates a DbListener from a normal PureScript Eff function for the
listen function.
declarations.title: _dbListener

declarations.comments: Creates a DbListener for a callback that takes two arguments
declarations.title: _dbListenerFn2
